content:
/>
X.i.4.A.1.b
.
Jurisdiction Over Accounts Payable
The Manila RO has jurisdiction over all accounts payable at the
half-dollar rate, which is $0.50 for each dollar authorized under the applicable law, and
full-dollar rate under
PL 106-377
and
PL 108-183
.
Reference
:  For more information on the payment of benefits at the half-dollar rate and full-dollar rate, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 4.B
and
D
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section A - General Information on Philippine Cases
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section A
